text: Thanks for responding, although I don't understand what you mean. I only expect 1 webhook to fire when a deal is created. I'm trying to understand why an additional 11 are fired.
You may use web hooks for this.
Webhook is not an option since I need all historical records
What exactly do you need and at what point of time ? In the above thread you mentioned you need contact IDs after someone fills the form up.

hi team!
can someone please guide?
issue is that there can be multiple ‘internal HubSpot id’ for single campaign.
If you want your API getting triggered as soon as someone fill the form then your best choice is Webhook. For this you may use public/private app.
I need all the historical with contact id and form id
If I need one or multiple api endpoints it's fine as long as I can get the data
